fish.payara.micro.event

Interface PayaraClusteredCDIEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PayaraClusteredCDIEventImpl

    public interface PayaraClusteredCDIEvent
extends Serializable
    Interface that classes must implement to be used as Clustered Events
    Author:
    Steve Millidge
